description: Detects defence evasion attempt via odbcconf.exe execution to load DLL
false_positives: Legitimate use of odbcconf.exe by legitimate user
name: Application Whitelisting Bypass via DLL Loaded by odbcconf.exe
query: ((process.executable:*\\odbcconf.exe AND process.command_line:(*\-f* OR *regsvr*)) OR (process.parent.executable:*\\odbcconf.exe AND process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe))
author: Kirill Kiryanov
Beyu Denis
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
oscd.community
